Multiple social media users: including Congress members and organizations, shared the viral images of Health Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan playing ludo and chopping vegetables during the lockdown.
The images were accompanied by captions: 3. Alt News performed a keyword search and found that the viral image was published by The Tribune on March 13, 2019, with the explanation that it was taken after the Lok Sabha polls.
Alt News also performed a reverse image: 2013, as part of a photo essay on Dr Vardhan after the Delhi Legislative Assembly elections.
